original_context: Zander does not have sharp claws.
Any legendary creature that has sharp claws or roams wild is formidable.
If Zander is remembered, then he roams wild.
If Zander commands respect or has noble pride, then he demands loyalty.
All legendary creatures that inspire legends are remembered.
If Zander either has a majestic roar or breathes fire (but not both), then he is ancient.
If Zander is an ancient legendary creature, then he either commands respect or wields elemental fury, but not both.
Every legendary creature that wields elemental fury either leaves a lasting legacy or inspires legends.
For all legendary creatures, if a creature is feared by all, then it possesses great power and leaves a lasting legacy.
